Delivery: Was a bit anxious when I read multiple bad reviews regarding dresslily's reliability on trustpilot. Over half of the reviews were negative. Got even more nervous when the track 'n trace site could not find any other information but the hoodie leaving the warehouse. No information, multiple consecutive days in a row. Something about an "unknown track". But it got here, 10 days after the order was confirmed. That's even faster than expected. Also, because I did not spend more than ‚Ç¨22 (I got this hoodie for ‚Ç¨10 - ‚Ç¨11, and ‚Ç¨2 - ‚Ç¨3 shipping), no extra fees applied (importing stuff from outside of Europe will cost more; ‚Ç¨22 is the limit, I think?).  Quality: It's 5% cotton and 95% polyester. So even though the material is not that thick, it still keeps me warm. Wouldn't recommend working out in this hoodie, though; it doesn't really "breathe". It was not damaged, either during fabrication or transport.  I'm 193cm, or well over 6'3, and I got an S, which fits perfectly. So the measuring tables were accurate. Wouldn't know what giant would need XL then, but ok.  I'm very, very pleased. It is a great hoodie. Really glad I ordered it, since they seem to be out of stock at the time of writing this review.

It's designed for a baby,  but fits a small animal too. It's my puppy pocket! It's hot weather today but we just got a new air conditioner installed,  so it's chilly in our house.  n
